title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.12 - Annual evaluations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.12 - Annual evaluations

State Regulations

On June 30th of each year, each
attorneys for children advisory committee shall submit to the Appellate

Division an evaluation of the operation of the plan and the training programs, and recommendations as to procedures, if any, which should be adopted to
improve the performance thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
679.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
